=======
SyllaPy
=======


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/syllapy.svg

    :alt: Codacy



Calculate syllable counts for English words.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://syllapy.readthedocs.io.


************
Installation
************
.. code-block:: python

    pip install syllapy

*****
Usage
*****

.. code-block:: python

    import syllapy
    count = syllapy.count('additional')
